description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Streaming Service elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-30089):

1. Download the applicable update package for your Windows version from the links provided below.
2. Install the update to mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability.
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
This update addresses a use-after-free vulnerability that could allow an attacker to gain elevated privileges. It is crucial to ensure your system is running the necessary build version listed to successfully apply the update. 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your Windows system matches one of the specified versions.
- Backup critical data before proceeding.

**Update Packages**:
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2 and 21H2, download from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211.
- For Windows 11 Versions 23H2 and 22H2, download from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212.
- For Windows 11 Version 21H2, download from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039213.
